articles.title: ‘A new culture’: discovery in China reveals ochre processing in east Asia up to 41,000 years ago - The Guardian
articles.description: Site in Nihewan Basin shows, ‘a potential signpost of a migration event of our species’, says Australian researcher
articles.content:

articles.author: Drew Hinshaw
articles.title: Foreign Refugees Fleeing Ukraine Say They Were Held for Days at Border - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: People from Africa, South Asia and the Middle East say they were pulled aside, as guards prioritized Ukrainians
articles.content: MEDYKA, PolandRefugees from Africa, South Asia and the Middle East said border guards made them wait for days to leave Ukraine, outside in often snowy weather, before entering Poland, saying Ukraines… [+416 chars]

articles.title: Veteran TVB actress-host Samantha Chuk dies aged 55 - AsiaOne
articles.description: Veteran TVB artiste Samantha Chuk has died of lung cancer at age 55. In a Facebook post on Wednesday (March 2), TVB Entertainment News said the Hong Kong actress-host died at home in her sleep on Tuesday night surrounded by family. [embed]https://www.facebook…
articles.content:
